attributes.action: stop the extradition to the US of accused hacker Gary McKinnon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the extradition to the US of accused hacker Gary McKinnon. To send a British citizen to the US, without any right to bail, to face 10 years in prison for a crime for which he would be unlikely to receive any custodial sentence if tried here amounts to 'cruel and unusual' punishment' in breach of our 1689 Bill of Rights.

rejection.details:
As you will see in our terms and conditions (http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms), we don't accept petitions on individual legal cases. 

We advise petitioners to take their concerns on such matters directly to the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
